test-6.descriptions: When plot fill colour gets updated through setJSONData() then plotborder colour should updated with plotfillcolor when inheritplotbordercolorfromplot=1 and if plotbordercolor is not specified.

test-10.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot attribute updated from 0 to 1 then plotbordercolor should updated with plotfillcolor with opacity 100% only if any plotbordercolor is not specified explicitly.

test-20.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot is updated from 0 to 1 from dataset level then border colour of that dataset will updated with the plotfill colour

test-21.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot is updated from 1 to 0 from dataset level then border colour of that dataset will updated with the plotfill colour

test-26.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot is updated from chart level =0 to 1 and dataset level=1 to 0 then all dataset  except one plotbordercolor will take the colour of plots

test-27.descriptions: When inheritplotbordercolorfromplot is updated from chart level =1 to 0 and dataset level=0 to 1 then only that dataset will take the  bordercolor of the plots and remaining dataset will take the default colour of plots(black)
